price: Ntumwa y’Imana! Mbega ntiwamenye ko Imana Allah Izi neza ibiri mw’ijuru no mw’isi! Mu vy’ukuri, ubumenyi bw’ivyo vyose bwanditswe mu Gitabu nyezina canditswemwo ivyagezwe n’ishirwa mu ngiro ryavyo "Lawhu Mahfuudhw". Mu vy’ukuri, ubumenyi bw’ivyo vyose rero buroroshe ku Mana Allah nta kiyisoba.
arabic: أَلَمۡ تَعۡلَمۡ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَعۡلَمُ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ فِي كِتَٰبٍۚ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ يَسِيرٞ

meta.transliteration: alam taʿlam anna al-laha yaʿlamu mā fī al-samāi wal-arḍi inna dhālika fī kitābin inna dhālika ʿalā al-lahi yasīrun
